first_para: Jo-Anne Elizabeth Dobson (née Elliott) is an Ulster Unionist Party politician in Northern Ireland who was elected to the Northern Ireland Assembly in 2011.

full.extract:
Jo-Anne Elizabeth Dobson (née Elliott) is an Ulster Unionist Party politician in Northern Ireland who was elected to the Northern Ireland Assembly in 2011.
Dobson was elected to Craigavon Borough Council in a by-election in 2010 - winning 64% of the vote. Upon her election to Stormont she stepped down from Council in 2012, being replaced by Colin McCusker, General Secretary of the Ulster Unionist Party.
^ BBC News - Election 2011
^ http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/northern_ireland/8459304.stm
full.title: Jo-Anne Dobson
